questions.name: What is the most common symptom of COVID – 19?
To which group of viruses do coronaviruses belong?
When do symptoms show after the infection?

answers.text: By eating in the same room
By swimming in a pool with infected person
By living in the same house

questions.name: How to protect yourself against the coronavirus?

answers.text: Wear a mask that covers tour nose and mouth, wash your hand often, social distance yourself

Stay at home, play games, watch Netfilx a lot

questions.name: Who is most at risk for COVID-19?

answers.text: People with conditions that affect their immune system
People aged 60+ with health conditions affecting lung or heart
People aged 20+ with health conditions affecting lung or heart
